comment.realname: lifeasdaddy ...a guy, his wife, and their son...
comment.author: 13267298@N00
comment._content: There seems to be an error here. This is not the Scone Hotel, it is the Como Hotel. At the persistent URL we can zoom in to see that the sign on top of the hotel reads, "COMO HOTEL" That means we can track it down to the Como Hotel @ 35 Cremona Road, Como, New South Wales although I suspect the present day hotel has been rebuilt after fire. It's highly visible at this map link: maps.google.com.au/maps?f=q&hl=en&geocode=&q=... and at this Flickr example: www.flickr.com/photos/sgmdigital/2495301407/ The steam train pictured appears to be steaming into modern day Como Railway station here: maps.google.com.au/maps?f=q&hl=en&geocode=&q=... and there's this old image at the National Library of Australia: nla.gov.au/nla.pic-vn3297758

comment.author: 76211497@N04
comment._content: Yes you are right! It is Como Hotel (re-built after a fire). Good work BobMeade
